mapper.select: SELECT gi.id AS gi_id,seller_id,title,price,original_price,description,`condition`,is_sold,1 AS `type`, gi.gmt_create AS gi_gmt_create,gi.gmt_modified AS gi_gmt_modified, `c`.id AS c_id,category_id,category_designation, `c`.gmt_create AS c_gmt_create,`c`.gmt_modified AS c_gmt_modified, i.id AS i_id,i.goods_id,image_link, i.gmt_create AS i_gmt_create,i.gmt_modified AS i_gmt_modified, t.id AS t_id,content, t.gmt_create AS t_gmt_create,t.gmt_modified AS t_gmt_modified FROM goods_info AS gi LEFT JOIN goods_category AS c ON gi.category=c.category_id LEFT JOIN goods_image AS i ON i.goods_id=gi.id LEFT JOIN goods_tag AS `gt` ON `gt`.goods_id=gi.id LEFT JOIN tag_of_goods AS t ON t.id=`gt`.tag_id WHERE gi.id=#{id}

SELECT gi.id AS gi_id,seller_id,title,price,original_price,description,`condition`,is_sold,1 AS `type`, gi.gmt_create AS gi_gmt_create,gi.gmt_modified AS gi_gmt_modified, `c`.id AS c_id,category_id,category_designation, `c`.gmt_create AS c_gmt_create,`c`.gmt_modified AS c_gmt_modified, i.id AS i_id,i.goods_id,image_link, i.gmt_create AS i_gmt_create,i.gmt_modified AS i_gmt_modified, t.id AS t_id,content, t.gmt_create AS t_gmt_create,t.gmt_modified AS t_gmt_modified FROM goods_info AS gi LEFT JOIN goods_enshrine AS ge ON ge.goods_id=gi.id LEFT JOIN goods_category AS c ON gi.category=c.category_id LEFT JOIN goods_image AS i ON i.goods_id=gi.id LEFT JOIN goods_tag AS `gt` ON `gt`.goods_id=gi.id LEFT JOIN tag_of_goods AS t ON t.id=`gt`.tag_id WHERE ge.user_id=#{user.id} limit #{user.begin},#{user.size}
